content.question: A student pours a <math alttext="10 milliliter" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>10.0</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>mL</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> sample of a solution containing <math alttext="H C 2 H 3 O 2, open parenthesis, p K sub a equals 4.8, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>HC</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.2em"></mspace><mo>(</mo><mtext>p</mtext><msub><mrow><mi>K</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>a</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>4.8</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="N a C 2 H 3 O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>NaC</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> into a test tube. The student adds a few drops of bromocresol green to the test tube and observes a yellow color, which indicates that the pH of the solution is less than <math alttext="3.8" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3.8</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>. Based on this result, which of the following is true about the relative concentrations of <math alttext="H C 2 H 3 O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>HC</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="N a C 2 H 3 O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>NaC</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> in the original solution?

choices.label: <math alttext="the molar concentration of H C 2 H 3 O 2 is greater than the molar concentration of N a C 2 H 3 O 2 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>[</mtext><mtext>HC</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>]</mtext><mo>></mo><mtext>[</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>NaC</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>]</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the molar concentration of H C 2 H 3 O 2 equals the molar concentration of N a C 2 H 3 O 2 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>[</mtext><mtext>HC</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>]</mtext><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>[</mtext><mtext>NaC</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>]</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the molar concentration of H C 2 H 3 O 2 is less than the molar concentration of N a C 2 H 3 O 2 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>[</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>HC</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>]</mtext><mo><</mo><mtext>[</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>NaC</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>]</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

The relative concentrations cannot be determined without knowing the value of <math alttext="p K sub b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msub><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtext>p</mtext><mi>K</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></math> for <math alttext="C 2 H 3 O 2 with a negative 1 charge" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>C</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mrow><mo>âˆ’</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></math>.

content.answer: <math alttext="the molar concentration of H C 2 H 3 O 2 is greater than the molar concentration of N a C 2 H 3 O 2 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>[</mtext><mtext>HC</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>]</mtext><mo>></mo><mtext>[</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>NaC</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>]</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.D: Make observations or collect data from representations of laboratory setups or results, while attending to precision where appropriate.
